title: Xero Connector
summary: Xero API Connector lets you query, create and modify entities in the Xero accounting system
description:
Xero API Connector lets you query, create and modify different entities such as Accounts, Transactions, Contacts, Invoices and Orders. .

Basic Actions

  • Create Entity

  • Update Entity

  • Get Entity

  • Delete Entity

  • Execute Query
author: Mikael Hakansson
